bio:
co-founder @ Gaslite
Gas Optimization Audits
Efficient Public Goods
The "Gas Bad" guy
contributionDescription:
We recently launched Gaslite Drop.

Gaslite Drop is a smart contract and dapp designed to facilitate hyper efficient bulk transfers of ERC20, ERC721, and Native Network Tokens.

Gaslite Drop is entirely open source and welcomes community contributions.

This is our first public good of many that has been deployed on Optimism..
impactDescription:
Gaslite Drop improves the the experience of rewarding and incentivizing your community.

We allow user's to effortlessly, safely, and efficiently facilitate transfers to their end users.

Through our easy to use UI and highly optimized Yul based airdrop contract anyone can bulk transfer assets to anyone.
pwCategorySuggestions: Tokenization Platforms, Smart Contract Platforms, User Experience & Adoption
